synthesis_conditions.equipment: polytetrafluoroethylene vial within a stainless steel casing
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Crystals were collected by filtration and washed thoroughly with N,N-dimethylformamide
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystals were treated in an oven at 100 ºC for 3 h before analysis (Supplementary Figure 16)

synthesis_conditions.temperature: Molten imidazole heated in an oil bath for 30 min
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Filtered, washed with H2O:EtOH:HNO3 mixture, then sequentially with H2O, EtOH, and Et2O
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The resulting product was a beige solid
